name: codeship-bitbucket-buildstatus
description: Update Bitbucket commits with their Codeship build status automatically.

BITBUCKET_USERNAME.description: Your Bitbucket team name or username.

BITBUCKET_API_KEY.description: Your Bitbucket team API key (recommended) or password.

HTTP_BASIC_USER.description: Username for webhook URL HTTP BASIC Auth.

HTTP_BASIC_PASS.description: Password for webhook URL HTTP BASIC Auth.
